trans-unit.source: Stores linked resources to be sent as part of an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 存放區連結的資源做為電子郵件訊息的一部分傳送。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the LinkedResourceCollection class is returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: LinkedResourceCollection 類別的執行個體由<xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> occupied.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>佔用。</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> </xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> on all views in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用<xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A>此集合中的所有檢視。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> method.
You do not need to call it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要在您的應用程式中呼叫它。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>。</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>
